data.name: Global Azure 2020. u Križevcima
data.description: Global Azure 2020. u Križevcima U subotu, 25. travnja 2020. od 9:00 sati, Razvojni centar i tehnološki park u Križevcima postat će jedna od preko 200 lokacija diljem svijeta na kojoj će se održati hrvatska instanca Global Azure-a 2020. Događaj je to posvećen Microsoftovoj cloud computing platformi…

relatedRecords.name: Kulen Community Dayz 2020
relatedRecords.description: IT Conference, 3 dayz, 67+ sessions and more! KulenDayz is all for meeting people from IT community and sharing experiences from everyday work. Organized by community it keeps a unique style, talks out of standard conference rooms and speakers ready for a discussion.
